languages.text:
Base Armour Property: +20 Strength
If there are no xenos in the party, the wearer gains +10 to all characteristics.

traits.locale_text:
Base Armour Property: +20 Strength
If there are no xenos in the party, the wearer gains +10 to all characteristics.

languages.text: As long as there are no xenos in the party, the wearer gains +10 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. Base armour property: +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Base Armour Property: +20 Strength
If there are no xenos in the party, the wearer gains +10 to all characteristics.

traits.locale_text: As long as there are no xenos in the party, the wearer gains +10 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. Base armour property: +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.
As long as there are no xenos in the party, the wearer gains +10 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. Base armour property: +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.
As long as there are no xenos in the party, the wearer gains +10 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. Base armour property: +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

languages.text: パーティーにはゼノがいない場合、使用者はすべての{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}に+10を得る。 基本アーマー特性：+20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}。
languages.original_text: As long as there are no xenos in the party, the wearer gains +10 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. Base armour property: +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: パーティーにはゼノがいない場合、使用者はすべての{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}に+10を得る。 基本アーマー特性：+20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}。

languages.text: Tant que le groupe ne comporte aucun xénos, l'utilisateur reçoit un bonus de +10 pour toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g}. Propriété d'armure de base : +20 à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}.
languages.original_text: As long as there are no xenos in the party, the wearer gains +10 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. Base armour property: +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Tant que le groupe ne comporte aucun xénos, l'utilisateur reçoit un bonus de +10 pour toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g}. Propriété d'armure de base : +20 à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}.

languages.text: Si no hay xenos en el grupo, el portador gana +10 a todas sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g}. Propiedad básica de armadura: +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}.
languages.original_text: As long as there are no xenos in the party, the wearer gains +10 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. Base armour property: +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si no hay xenos en el grupo, el portador gana +10 a todas sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g}. Propiedad básica de armadura: +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}.

languages.text: 当队伍中没有异形时，装备者所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}提高10点。 基础护甲特性：+20{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}。
languages.original_text: As long as there are no xenos in the party, the wearer gains +10 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. Base armour property: +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当队伍中没有异形时，装备者所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}提高10点。 基础护甲特性：+20{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}。

languages.text: Giyen kişi, grupta hiç zeno olmadığı sürece tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerine{/g} +10 kazanır. Taban zırh özelliği: +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g}.
languages.original_text: As long as there are no xenos in the party, the wearer gains +10 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. Base armour property: +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Giyen kişi, grupta hiç zeno olmadığı sürece tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerine{/g} +10 kazanır. Taban zırh özelliği: +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g}.

languages.text: Solange der Gruppe keine Xenos angehören, erhält der Träger +10 auf alle {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}. Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}.
languages.original_text: As long as there are no xenos in the party, the wearer gains +10 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. Base armour property: +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Solange der Gruppe keine Xenos angehören, erhält der Träger +10 auf alle {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}. Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}.

languages.text: Если в отряде нет ксеносов, персонаж получает +10 ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g}. Базовое свойство: +20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}.
languages.original_text: As long as there are no xenos in the party, the wearer gains +10 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. Base armour property: +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Если в отряде нет ксеносов, персонаж получает +10 ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g}. Базовое свойство: +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}.
Если в отряде нет ксеносов, персонаж получает +10 ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g}. Базовое свойство: +20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}.
